QuestData.Title: Lost!
QuestData.Description: You've got to help me, $n! My friend, Ringo left earlier to explore the volcano to the north of here, and he has been gone way too long. I am really worried about him.$B$BDo you think you could find him? Why don't you take my canteen with you -- if you do find Ringo, I'm sure he'll need it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find signs of Ringo at Fire Plume Ridge.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ringo's sack rests on the rock in front of you.
QuestData.RewardText: You find what appears to be Ringo's belongings. If he left these here, he can't have gone far away. Maybe you should look for him.
